text:
Can you believe this?
Turned up on foot for #vaccine appointment, but because not in a car was refused #vaccination!!!!
Further, appears no local walk-in centre!
Car discrimination?
Who planned this?

@NicolaSturgeon @andywightman @IainGrayMSP @uartlach 
#COVID19 #Covid19UK https://t.co/8EHm1ZOiN4
